Articles.Content:
Well I saw this mod recently on reddit <link removed> and I was really excited because of it. One of the features that are the most interessting for me are new planets. Since i did not read anything about this mod in the forums, did you know this mod. And do you like it? I personally would like to have exactly the real planets in KSP to do the missions NASA doesn't. So what do you think this mod brings us?

Edited November 15, 2013 by Specialist290
Removing download link to unlicensed mod released without source code.

I have it. But it doesn't have source code released, that's why it isn't posted on these forums (Source is a requirement for addons).

If you want a realistic solar system you should check out the Real Solar System mod. It modifies the planets to proper sizes and shuffles their orbits to resemble our own solar system. Makes the game much harder but it's good fun.

Yeah, I've actually got the mod. Found it posted on an external website. So far I've found no problems with it and the planets are really fun and interesting to visit. Skelton, kind of a Mars analog has an Olympus Mons type mountain but on steroids. So much so it looks like a bad pimple on the planet.

Edited November 15, 2013 by Specialist290
He should add two more gas giants farther out than Sentar and expand the Sun's SOI so if your WAAAAAAAAAAAAAAY far out, the kraken doesn't phuck up your game.

Kragrathea's PlanetFactory mod was released without either licensing or source code, and thus is in violation of the community's add-on posting guidelines. This means that we cannot allow users to post links to external sites offering this modification for download or to solicit download links from other users, as is the case for prohibited content in general.

Thread closed. Everyone have a nice day

Edited November 15, 2013 by Specialist290
